content:
Let's add a new row to the template for your upcoming Chicago trip.

**Updated Travel Expenses Template:**

| Date | Trip Details | Flight Costs | Transportation Costs | Accommodation Costs | Food & Activities | Total |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Month | NYC to LAX (Trip 1) | $500 | $60 | $600 | ? | ? |
| Month | NYC to LAX (Trip 2) | $500 | $0 | $600 | ? | ? |
| Upcoming | NYC to CHI (Business Meeting) | ? | ? | ? | ? | ? |

As you mentioned, you'll be flying from New York, so we can fill in the "Trip Details" column. You can update the "Flight Costs" column once you have a better idea of the ticket price.

For now, let's focus on estimating the food and activity costs for your previous LAX trips. Do you think you can give me a rough estimate of your daily expenses for food and activities during those trips? Was it around $50-100 per day, or more/less?

Once we have those estimates, we can calculate the total cost for each trip and get a better sense of your overall travel expenses.

Also, feel free to add any other details you think might be relevant for your Chicago trip, such as the meeting dates or any specific transportation or accommodation arrangements.
